movie.title: The Hater
movie.description_intro: A young man searches for purpose in a net of hatred and violence that he tries to control.
movie.description_full: A young man searches for purpose in a net of hatred and violence that he tries to control.

movies.title: One Hundred and One Dalmatians
movies.summary: Pongo and Perdita have a litter of 15 puppies. Cruella De Vil takes a fancy to the pups, and wants to get hold of them, as well as more pups, to make herself a lovely dalmatian skin coat... Cruella hires some thugs to kidnap the pups and hold them at her mansion. Will Pongo and Perdita find them in time ?
movies.description_full: Pongo and Perdita have a litter of 15 puppies. Cruella De Vil takes a fancy to the pups, and wants to get hold of them, as well as more pups, to make herself a lovely dalmatian skin coat... Cruella hires some thugs to kidnap the pups and hold them at her mansion. Will Pongo and Perdita find them in time ?

movies.title: Tom and Jerry & The Wizard of Oz
movies.title_english: Tom and Jerry & The Wizard of Oz
movies.title_long: Tom and Jerry & The Wizard of Oz (2011)
movies.summary: Tom the Cat and Jerry the Mouse get whisked away into The land of Oz.
movies.description_full: Tom the Cat and Jerry the Mouse get whisked away into The land of Oz.
movies.synopsis: Tom the Cat and Jerry the Mouse get whisked away into The land of Oz.

movies.title: Sons of Hollywood 'Night, Father
movies.summary: Dave returns home after spending several days with the Spelling family as they deal with the death of patriarch Aaron Spelling. Later, Sean discusses his music career with his father, Rod Stewart. Later on, he confides to his friend Joser that he thinks others, including his father, do not think he can succeed as a singer, to which Joser replies that it's really up to Sean to believe that he can do it. Meanwhile, David tends to his clients, including the rapper Kurupt, also an aspiring actor and a colleague of Snoop Dogg. Elsewhere, Dave talks to Randy about his sister Tori's behavior during their father's funeral and the bitter feud between Tori and their mother, Candy. All three Sons meet up at a restaurant where things get silly, and tensions are broken with a mock food fight. Dave and Randy decide to visit Aaron Spelling's star in the Walk of Fame. When they return home, Dave and Randy are told by Sean that he has hired hookers!

movies.title: Boruto: Naruto The Movie
movies.summary: Boruto Uzumaki is the son of Naruto Uzumaki, the Seventh Hokage of the Hidden Leaf Village. Having heard stories of Naruto's deeds as a hero, Boruto wishes to surpass his father. Following Sarada Uchiha, Boruto meets his father's friend, Sasuke Uchiha, and requests to be trained by him.
